title: Tom Cruise has a lively chat with mega producer Jerry Bruckheimer and director Christopher McQuarrie
text:
They've worked together through the years on some of the hottest Hollywood Blockbusters of all time.

And Tom Cruise seemed to be pleased to be in good company as he left a secret screening with Jerry Bruckheimer and Christopher McQuarrie in New Jersey on Tuesday night.

The 57-year-old actor dressed casually in jeans and a sweater to meet up with his all-star team, with producer Bruckheimer at the helm of his Top Gun debut while McQuarrie has directed Cruise in multiple Mission: Impossible flicks.

Happy guy: Tom Cruise seemed to be pleased to be in good company as he left a secret screening with Jerry Bruckheimer and Christopher McQuarrie in New Jersey on Tuesday night

Tom wore a tight navy crewneck sweater to match a pair of dark washed denim slacks as he left the AMC Theatres.

He walked through the underground parking garage wearing a pair of shiny black leather dress shoes.

Cruise appeared to be in a jovial mood as he chatted it up with a team of executives, including Top Gun: Maverick's Joseph Kosinski.

Night out: The 57-year-old actor dressed casually in jeans and a sweater to meet up with his all-star team

Uniform: Tom wore a tight navy crewneck sweater to match a pair of dark washed denim slacks as he left the AMC Theatres

Pound it out: Christopher and Jerry had a few things to discuss

Tom and Jerry first worked together on the classic action flick 1986 Top Gun, arguably one of Cruise's biggest roles to date.

He later went on to produce Days of Thunder in 1990 and joined his acting buddy to work on the highly anticipated film Top Gun: Maverick.

Writer and Director Christopher McQuarrie looked at ease in good company while talking business.

Just a few friends: Writer and Director Christopher McQuarrie looked at ease in good company while talking business

Hugs! Cruise appeared to be in a jovial mood as he chatted it up with a team of executives, including Top Gun: Maverick's Joseph Kosinski

McQuarrie and Cruise created magic in the latest installation of Mission: Impossible – Fallout.

They've also worked together on Mission: Impossible – Rogue Nation, Edge of Tomorrow, Jack Reacher and Valkyrie.

Tom will soon see Christopher on set again as he's set to direct Mission: Impossible 7 and 8.

Action! They've also worked together on Mission: Impossible – Rogue Nation, Edge of Tomorrow, Jack Reacher and Valkyrie

Take My Breath Away: Tom and Jerry first worked together on the classic action flick 1986 Top Gun, arguably one of Cruise's biggest roles to date

Blast from the past: Jerry later went on to produce Days of Thunder in 1990 where Tom met his future ex-wife, Nicole Kidman

Despite being a highly coveted actor in Hollywood, Tom's more recluse about his private life and is rarely seen out and about.

The Scientologist was married to Nicole Kidman for nearly 11 years before the couple divorced in 2001.

He later married Katie Holmes just a few months after she gave birth to their daughter Suri in April 2006, but their marriage ended in divorce in 2012.
